mapper.select: SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_WRITER, BRD_TITLE, BRD_REG_DT, BRD_HIT, BRD_RE_CNT, BRD_DEL_FLAG FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_DEL_FLAG LIKE 'N' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_WRITER, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_REG_DT, BRD_HIT, BRD_RE_CNT, BRD_DEL_FLAG FROM ( select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rowNum, BRD_NO, BRD_WRITER, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_REG_DT, BRD_HIT, BRD_RE_CNT, BRD_DEL_FLAG from BOARD where (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 and @ROWNUM<= ${pageNum} * ${amount} ) as b WHERE b.rowNum> (${pageNum}-1) *${amount}
order by brd_no desc;

mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT COM1 INNER JOIN COMMENT COM2 ON COM2.RE_BRD_NO=COM1.RE_BRD_NO AND COM1.RE_ORDER >COM2.RE_ORDER SET COM1.RE_ORDER = COM1.RE_ORDER - 1 WHERE COM2.RE_NO=#{reNo}
